      • add

        public static MessageFormatter add(MessageFormatter a,
                   MessageFormatter b)
        Adds every parameter in both message formatters. Note that a and b must be non-null and have the same player source.
        Parameters:
        a - - first message formatter to add.
        b - - second message formatter to add.
        Returns:
        The resulting message formatter.

      • add

        public MessageFormatter add(MessageFormatter other)
        Adds every parameter in both message formatters, creating a new message formatter with the results.
        Parameters:
        other - - message formatter to add.
        Returns:
        The resulting message formatter.
